channel.title: Dark Bow
channel.description:
Ok, so i coded in the dark bow from silab's client, made it a range weapon, etc. all that good stuff. Now i just need to figure out how to make it hit twice.
Feel like helping me out?

item.title: Dark Bow
item.dc:creator: @legend_rene legend rene
item.description:
@legend_rene wrote:

He doesnt know how to make it double hit , so if you just add Doubleprojectile it wont do everything.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Bow
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

[quote=“Jordonc2005, post:3, topic:139204”]well if you’ve added everything else needed, just add this

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7622) { DoubleProjectile = true; } else { DoubleProjectile = false; } im sure u know where 2 add it, if u dont ill tell ya[/quote]

Lul, that wont work, this is why

  1. no DoubleProjectile boolean
  2. 1 boolean wont do anything

Read full topic
